data.title: Emmylou Harris Tickets - 2024 Tour Dates
data.meta_description: Get your Emmylou Harris concert tickets now! Experience the legendary singer live. Limited availability, secure your seats today!
data.text:
Emmylou Harris Concert Tickets

As one of the most expressive voices in country music Emmylou Harris tickets remain a precious gift. Since beginning her career in 1969 Emmylou has delighted audiences across the world for decades. With a talent for songwriting and the skill to interpret many artists’ music Emmylou Harris has made spectacular shows part of her trademark. Hailing from Birmingham Alabama, Emmylou moved across the south during her childhood before earning a scholarship to the University of North Carolina at Greensboro for music. Harris left school to pursue her music career in New York which would prove to be a great choice with 14 Grammy wins and a spot in the Country Music Hall of Fame.

Emmylou Harris tickets continue to deliver year after year as her catalog grows with the numerous artists she’s worked with. As a guest, she has boosted the songs of artists like Neil Young, Linda Ronstadt, and Bob Dylan. There’s so much history in Emmylou’s music like her stories of time spent with Gram Parson’s band the Fallen Angels featured on the song “The Road”. Narrowing down Emmylou Harris’s career into any single night is guaranteed to be a treat with her work on other’s songs as well as her own. Her 1995 release Wrecking Ball was acclaimed for her renditions of songs like “May This Be Love” by Jimi Hendrix and “All My Tears” by Julie Miller. In 2018 Emmylou Harris was awarded the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.

How much are Emmylou Harris tickets?

$207.49 is the average price you’ll pay for entry to see Emmylou Harris perform live. Many of the singer’s live performances have cheap Emmylou Harris tickets posted for just $63.47 a ticket. The most you can expect to pay to see Emmylou Harris live in concert is $1143.00.

As time passes the prices for finding Emmylou Harris live in concert have matured along with her music. The average price for general admission for a show at a venue like Sweetland Amphitheatre at Boyd Park in Lagrange Georgia could start around $60. With general admission lawn tickets being the low end of pricing, you can see prices rising to around $230 for VIP options. Other events like the concert at Canal Shores Golf Course in Evanston, Illinois had tickets around $70 to $140.

Emmylou Harris 2024 Tour Dates

Emmylou Harris 2024 tour schedule has 1 concerts lined up for this year. Emmylou Harris's next show will take place on September 11th, 2024 at 7:30pm at the Durham Performing Arts Center, which is located at 123 Vivian St, Durham, NC. Emmylou Harris concert tickets range from $63.47 - $1143.00 a ticket. Place your order now because there are only 496 tickets still available for this performance. Secure your chance to see this music star live in concert by ordering your Emmylou Harris tickets today with TicketSmarter.

With over 50 years in the music business, Emmylou Harris tends to still go on tour around the United States as much as possible. From throwing shows at her alma mater University of North Carolina at Greensboro to shows in Nashville at the War Memorial Auditorium Emmylou makes many stops around the southern part of the country. Harris does branch out however making stops at Golden Gate Park in San Franciso with Robert Plant as well as at the Town Hall in New York City with Steve Earle. While Emmylou is most commonly spotted in Nashville, she can also be commonly spotted performing with Rodney Crowell or Patty Griffin.

When do Emmylou Harris tickets go on sale?

Keeping track of the Emmylou Harris performer page will allow you to know about any future events up to six months out. As soon as tickets are available you can purchase them without any presale code.

Songs from the Emmylou Harris Tour Setlist

Emmylou Harris's setlist while performing in St. John's , NL at “Bannerman Park” included the following songs:

Here I Am

Two More Bottles of Wine

Making Believe

Get Up John

Born to Run

Sonny's Dream

One of These Days

Luxury Liner

Darlin' Kate

Goin' Back To Harlan

Orphan Girl

Hello Stranger

Calling My Children Home

Red Dirt Girl

O Evangeline

All the Roadrunning

Encore

Pilgrim

Source: Setlist.fm
